title: KOL Management
introDescription: X8C partners with top crypto KOLs to increase your project exposure, grow audience, and build brand credibility. We offer KOL mapping, identification, management, and relationship-building services at multiple price points.
processDescription: The process of creating your marketing strategy will vary depending on your specific goals and needs, however these are some of the steps you can expect us to take:

processList.label: Planning
processList.text: In this planning stage, we will work closely with your team to understand the budget and the platforms that your project would like to use for promotion.

processList.label: Outreach
processList.text: Once the planning stage is completed, we will reach out to a carefully curated selection of key opinion leaders (KOLs) who are a good fit for your projectâ€™s brand and campaign.

processList.label: Communications
processList.text: To ensure effective communication and coordination throughout the campaign, we will create a Telegram chat group for your project team.

processList.label: Performance
processList.text: Throughout the campaign, the KOLs will be responsible for completing a range of activities, such as creating content, posting on social media, and engaging with their audience.

processList.label: Knowledge
processList.text: The KOLs will send weekly reports to our team, which will be reviewed and presented to you to identify the areas of improvement.
